user_query: I am planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend, and I need some interesting facts about numbers to entertain the guests. Can you provide me with a random mathematical fact and a trivia fact? Additionally, suggest a funny Chuck Norris joke to lighten the mood.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random mathematical fact to entertain the guests.
Fetch a random trivia fact for the guests.
Fetch a funny Chuck Norris joke to lighten the mood.
